Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27591703] Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcus aureus isolates(MIC=4.3 ± 3.5 mg/L, MBC=6.0 ± 3.5 mg/L), Enterococcus faecalis isolates(MIC=2.7 ± 1.2 mg/L, MBC=3.3 ± 1.2 mg/L);Gram-negative bacteria :Pseudomonas aeruginosa isolates(MIC=1.3 ± 0.6 mg/L, MBC=1.7 ± 0.6 mg/L), Acinetobacter baumannii isolates(MIC=2.3 ± 1.5 mg/L, MBC=2.7 ± 1.2 mg/L)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27591703] 0% hemolysis at 64 μg/ml against human red blood cells; 0% hemolysis at 64 μg/ml against sheep red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.27591703] The cell viability of HEK293 cells induced by PV is 98.8%, 100%, 97.3%, 94.2%, 92.3%, 89.2% and 84.6% at peptide concentrations of 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64 μg/mL within 24h.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Design and characterization of short hybrid antimicrobial peptides from pEM-2, mastoparan-VT1, and mastoparan-B.
Literature.Reference: Chem Biol Drug Des. 2017 Mar;89(3)327-338. doi 10.1111/cbdd.12864.
Literature.Author: Memariani H, Shahbazzadeh D, Ranjbar R, Behdani M, Memariani M, Pooshang Bagheri K
